cz.petrkubes.ioweyou.Database

Class DatabaseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • cz.petrkubes.ioweyou.Database.DatabaseHandler

  • public class DatabaseHandler
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    Class for handling all reading and writing to the local database
    Author:
    Petr Kubes

                                                  java.lang.Integer userId)
        Returns list of debts with added variables for displaying
        Parameters:
        my - if true returns only debts owed by the user, otherwise returns debts owed to the user
        userId - userId
        Returns:
        list of extended debts

        userId - userId
        Returns:
